title: Ticket #4648: condor_log_reader.py not IPv6 ready
description:
/src/condor_utils/condor_log_reader.py around line 233 says: 
m = re.search( '(<\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+:\d+>)', text )
This is will fail in an IPv6 environment. The regex should be updated to understand IPv6 Sinful strings.
creator: adesmet
